House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04909
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROHIBITING THE DISPOSAL OF ELECTRONIC DEVICES AT SOLID WASTE MANAGEMENT FACILITIES
ABSTRACT : Aims to address improper disposal of electronic devices which poses a great deal of hazard to humans and the environment as such devices contain a surplus of toxic chemicals like lead, cadmium, and mercury, to name a few. Refers "Electronic Device" to a desktop or laptop computer, computer monitor, portable computer, cathode ray tube, flat panel television, or cellular phones.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : NIETO, JOHN MARVIN "YUL SERVO" C.
DATE FILED : 2019-09-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
